title: Taking offers: T205 Drum and Hindu
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Taking offers: T205 Drum and Hindu
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Turner Engle No question these are the two hardest backs to pick up in the T205 set. I am taking offers on them as a pair or individually. Send offers to mengle2@insight.rr.com Drum: [URL="http://imageshack.us"][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/1413/scan0077sq6.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL="http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=508&i=scan0077sq6.jpg"][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/1413/scan0077sq6.88d6b021ca.jpg[/IMG][/URL] [URL="http://imageshack.us"][IMG]http://img126.imageshack.us/img126/9466/scan0078tw7.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Hindu: [URL="http://imageshack.us"][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/8246/scan0079ek8.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL="http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=508&i=scan0079ek8.jpg"][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/8246/scan0079ek8.0021090a17.jpg[/IMG][/URL] [URL="http://imageshack.us"][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/9517/scan0080wd5.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL="http://g.imageshack.us/g.php?h=508&i=scan0080wd5.jpg"][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/9517/scan0080wd5.f9dde5fc15.jpg[/IMG][/URL] Also have this T205 Miscut. SGC 20. Next card is Stovall. $106 shipped. [URL="http://imageshack.us"][IMG]http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/6716/scan0081bq3.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

posts.post_title: Taking offers: T205 Drum and Hindu
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Turner Engle
The T205 Drum and Miscut have been spoken for. I have decided to keep the Hindu. Thanks to all who inquired about the cards.
